title: Reminder that MF is still super good

embed.description: Real-time LoL Stats! Check your Summoner, MMR, Live Spectate and using powerful global League of Legends Statistics!

replies.body: She's a caster ADC, in a meta that favors caster type characters (hint: assassins are casters), so there's not really any reason she'd fall out of favor.
is it that MF is really good, or that other ADC are really bad right now?
MF is very strong. She has been in the top 5 winrates since April. Ez Lucian Jhin Jinx are all still good btw

Honestly I would like that she continue to be in meta.
She hasn't high mobility and her ms effect is a bad version of draven which has more damage (they're both bully) and doesn't lost the effect if he's attacked.
If they should nerf mf, I hope they will powershift some power from early to lategame (eg less dmg but more attackspeed?).
Yes, she has potential. It's all about how someone plays her and how her team mates play that make the difference. But I'd say that about most Champions too.
